pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.utils

Class CurrencyUtilsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.utils.CurrencyUtilsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CurrencyUtils

    @Component
public class CurrencyUtilsImpl
extends Object
implements CurrencyUtils
    Utility class used to download JSON Array with currencies from NBP.PL and transform it into the List of Currency objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Detail

      • downloadCurrencyArray

        public org.json.JSONArray downloadCurrencyArray()
                                         throws org.json.JSONException,
                                                IOException
        Downloads and returns the JSONArray with the currencies. URL: "http://api.nbp.pl/api/exchangerates/tables/a/last/2/"
        Returns:
        A JSJSONArray representing the download JSONArray with currencies
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - A JSONException is thrown when the String is not able to be parsed to JSONArray
        IOException - A IOException is thrown when the method is not able to download the JSONArray from API

      • createPolishCurrency

        public Currency createPolishCurrency()
        Creates and returns a Currency object dedicated to Polish currency
        Returns:
        The Currency representing the Polish currency

      • extractCurrencyFromJsonObject

        public Currency extractCurrencyFromJsonObject(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject11,
                                              org.json.JSONObject jsonObject12)
                                       throws org.json.JSONException
        Returns a Currency extracted from JSON Objects.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject11 - The JSONObject containing the present values of currency
        jsonObject12 - The JSONObject containing the previous values of currency
        Returns:
        A Currency representing the Currency extracted from JSON Objects.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - A JSONException is thrown when the JSONObject is not able to return requested value

      • recalculateCurrency

        public void recalculateCurrency(List<Currency> currencyList,
                                String selectedCurrencyCode)
        Converts the list of Currency according to the given code.
        Parameters:
        currencyList - The List<Currency> containing the list to be converted
        selectedCurrencyCode - The String containing the code of the currency

      • getCurrencyList

        public List<Currency> getCurrencyList(String selectedCurrencyCode)
                               throws org.json.JSONException,
                                      IOException
        Description copied from interface: CurrencyUtils
        Returns the list of the Currency for given currency code
        Specified by:
        getCurrencyList in interface CurrencyUtils
        Parameters:
        selectedCurrencyCode - The String containing the code of the currency
        Returns:
        A The List<Currency> representing the list of currencies
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - A JSONException is thrown when the JSONObject is not able to return requested value
        IOException - A IOException is thrown then the JSONArray is not able to be download
